title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\EmployerFilter
name: EmployerFilter
description:
Employer filter of the search.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EmployerFilter

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.employer
params.description: Required. The name of the employer, for example "Google", "Alphabet".

params.name: data.mode
params.description: Define set of [EmploymentRecord][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EmploymentRecord]s to search against. Defaults to [EmployerFilterMode.ALL_EMPLOYMENT_RECORDS][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EmployerFilter.EmployerFilterMode.ALL_EMPLOYMENT_RECORDS].

params.name: data.negated
params.description: Whether to apply negation to the filter so profiles matching the filter is excluded.
